preqs: Twelve credit points of first-year Arts units.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ACL1%, AEH1%, AMU1%, ASA1%, ATS1%, AZA1%}

description: The unit is designed to introduce students to the origins of modern high fantasy via a range of major English texts from the early-Modern to the late-Modern period. The unit includes a selection of verse and prose narratives which use fairy and folk tale, myth and legend, the supernatural, weird, uncanny and marvellous to represent an idealised past, criticise the present and to explore the unconscious.
